Hi,
Here is the scenario:
We are registering a single view and creating multiple views using "View Discovery" pattern. How do I add filter logic based on the regions created?
Based on some condition, the values for the datagrid to be separated in the region.
Thanks
Raj

Hi Raj,

I believe I am not completely understanding your scenario.

If what you need is to "filter" the logic in your views / view models depending on which region they were created, I believe you could find the following thread interesting where a similar topic was discussed:
  • Manage 2 regions containing 2 UserControls of same type
Also, you might find the region context useful for providing information to the view depending on the region they are in:
  • Chapter 7 - Composing the User Interface - Sharing Data Between Multiple Regions
Regards,

Damian Cherubini
